sections.title: DPD Buckets
rules: 31–60 days: Moderate impact on credit score
61+ days: Severe delinquency, possible card freeze
examples: If you miss payment by 40 days, card may be restricted.
notes: DPD status reflects in bureau report monthly.

sections.title: Hardship Options
rules: Ask for due date extension (case by case).
examples: If total due is ₹50,000, you may convert to EMI to reduce immediate burden.
notes: Availability depends on risk profile and payment history.
